Class LevelSelectScreen

  • BaseScreen
    • edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.screens.LevelSelectScreen

  • public class LevelSelectScreen
extends BaseScreen

    Class that designates all logic within the level select screen.

    • Method Detail

      • show

        public void show()

        Method that creates the initial screen logic, creates a default font, and adds the options to the screen.

      • render

        public void render(float delta)

        Constantly updates the screen with new content.

        Parameters:
        delta - The time between the last and current call of the render() method.

      • resize

        public void resize(int width,
                   int height)

        Overriden method that is called whenever the screen changes sizes.

        Parameters:
        width - New width that the screen has resized to.
        height - New height that the screen has resized to.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()

        Method that disposes of fonts, and stages used to render the text.
